item.description:
Come join us for some fun canoeing or kayaking on the Charles River.

We will rent boats from Charles River Canoe and Kayak. Large canoes for 4-5 adults are $24/hr. Double kayaks are $18/hr. Please see their website for more details.

Here are directions to their Newton location:http://www.paddlebost...

We will have dinner at Le's at the Atrium Mall afterwards. It's on Level 1 of the mall.

300 Boylston Street
Chestnut Hill, MA 02467

Hope you can make it!

Brenda

PS - Transportation is your own responsibility. However, if you need a ride, please note where you are located or which T stop you can meet at. Someone in our group may be able to offer you a carpool.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Canoeing/Kayaking on the Charles (Newton)
